content: It's almost 2021 and this app still crashes any time you try upload or crop an image. They're clearly not going to fix it.
You can't print your photos
Asked for a refund as the app just kept crashing.
Tried to use the app and it just crashes after u try to crop inwas really looking forward to using this app but now am just really disappointed
App kept crashing everytime i loaded an image
Do not buy!!! Was watching Youtubers use it so thought it was good but was wrong. Only had it for 20 minutes thin I just got my money back. Not worth it.
Load a picture then shuts down
As other reviews state, the app just crashes when you try to load any design. I was really looking forward to using this app, but am bitterly disappointed.
wow!
Every time I clicked the start project plus sign it opens up my bitmoji app and not my images gallery this app is useless and I want a refund
Colors are way off
Force closes every time I choose an image. For $1.99 this has to be fixed asap. The app is unusable.
i just bought this app and every time i try to load an image, the app crashes and closes out. The app is completely unusable because of this - $2 wasted. I'd rate this zero stars if it would let me.
i love this app i really do but its keeps crashing !!! this needs to be fixed !!!!

Bought the app and let it sit. It creates really large patterns no matter 
how small a photo you use. It does not let you size your work and is pretty 
useless to me. Wish I could get a refund.
The app crashed every single time I load an image. I paid for the better version and can't even use it. Not happy.
Don't buy this app if you are an Artkal beader. There are no Artkal choices for old or new colors. If they ever get Artkal I might try to It again but right now it's just a waste of money.

ðŸ”¹Good, but could be WAY better. There should be a feature so that when you click on a color it shows only that color to make things easier.   ðŸ”¹It would also be cool that if there was a feature instead of only having the option of deleting a patter, you could adjust the size.

This is a great pattern maker. However, it definitely needs a way to select beads on the pattern or a highlight effect so you can discern the difference between colors. Perler red and hot coral look alike on the app. It gets worse when you add in another brand or shade. Overall it's an awesome tool for creating original works.

This does what I want but two features would make me not need other apps. A crop ratio that you could customise would be amazing, and being able to isolate each colour is essential because otherwise I don't know which one I'm actually buying and putting down.
Does what is says, great for beading.
Keeps crashing as soon as I try to load a picture just crash's

Haven't had any issues with the app it self. But I do wish they would be able to let us click on the bead and tell us what color it is. Also if it could let us order the bead with in the app that would be cool. And if you can transfer a good copy of the picture to another device.
Sadly, it keeps crashing. Which is pretty frustrating for a paid app.
4 out of 5 time it will crash. Been sending messages to support, never got any responses. Sure the app is amazing, but in my case, never got it to work perfectly yet.

This app never works! So far I have only gotten it to actually work one time. Every other time whenever I try to load a picture it force stops and gives me the "unfortunately bead it has stopped working" message. So frustrating! Do not recommend.

Would like to see some change as to the clicking if the colors I would like for it to be able to show u where every color go. Bc sometime it's hard to tell what color is showing. But besides that love this app. Have created so much.
I can't use the app anymore, it crashes each time.
It seemed to be working OK, managed about 20 patterns before it started crashing. The patterns themselves weren't too bad but definitely needs a way to change contrast and brightness. Refunded.
I get this message every time I try to crop an image to bead EVERY TIME! I would expect thus from a free app but not one I had to pay for. I want a refund.
The app is constantly crashing. Very dissatisfied tbh.
The app is well made except for the fact that it crashes after cropping, only cropped 2 images. Now crashes every time I crop
Instant Crash... Instant refund

I read the reviews, thought they were mostly over a year ago, I'll try it as maybe it's been fixed. Nope. I bought it 10 minutes ago, attempted 6 times to import 6 different pictures. It would ask to crop the picture, as soon as I tapped the 'Done' button, it would instantly crash. 6 times in a row. I then instantly hit refund. I own a Galaxy S5.

Really frustrating. It crashes extremely often trying to convert pictures. Sometimes it works fine, sometimes it refuses flat out to work at all. When it works it's fine but being so unstable it's just too frustrating to use.
Just stops working as soon as i try to upload an image
Crashes when i crop image
So far I've had no problems whatsoever with my android and I love this app! Thank you, I looked for months for an app like this and this is everything I hoped for and more!
The draw grid can't be set to off.  Kind of disappointed not like the one in iPhone app
Yeah so its a great cocept when it works however the interface is choppy and crashes consistently requiring a degree of patience that you wouldn't expect to need on an app at this price
Programme does not work keeps shutting down
Yess i recover my app again!

I don't find this app simple to use.  The colour it produces in the final results may not be what you want (ex. Shadows) changing the bead color is not really an option.  All in all not what i expected, disappointed.

Updated review - when I first purchased this app it ran like a champ, but recently it crashes frequently when rendering images.  Purchased this day 1 when it became available for Android, but will find a replacement unless updates are provided.
I like it because when I can make a portad I can take a picture the make it when I saw it today I was like I need to get it I was empress on how good the pics look when you bead it
Love this app. It makes the layouts so easy to do. I wish you could switch colors after it makes the layout but, it's not that big of an issue. Love the color count feature.
After using it for only a few minutes i was surprised.Its the best on ive used.Worth 1.99
Colors were off & it didn't work with all sprites only certain ones.
I bought this app to help me but it is always crashing I can't even pick a photo to generate it to Perler form. If it gets fixed then I'll give it a better rating
Not off to a good start.   After 10 trys to make a pattern I trashed the app and hit refund. No dice.
Shuts down a lot, also you can't change bead colors or add beads. It sees colors weird too. I tried a image with 3 colors total and they gave me a warped image with 8 colors.
Doesn't work for the HTC phone

Crashes all the time. Made 2 designs on it and now it always crashes when I try to do another. Would rate much higher if I could actually use it- the 2 designs I did do looked nice.  As of now, this was a waste of money. Using a Moto G. The Google App Store is starting to remind me of Atari in 83....
As title says, I can't choose a photo to upload, as it will crash before I get past the home screen. Using a OnePlus
Can't get app to render any picture
But the colors are way off and there's no way to change them.. Very disappointed!

It won't load my photos; when it does load, the photos look terrible; crashes on loading sometimes; no "help" in the program; no instructions; no ability to change beads in the picture.  That's enough for now.
Fix this!

I have had issues on my android, only with the email portion. It used to shut down when I wanted to use the email function. Now it emails but when I emailed my pattern it was a bunch of symbols and no pattern.
This App would be better if it did the same thing that the  iTunes app does.
Love the concept but it's way too unintuitive and no help what so ever. With an update this could well earn several more stars.
Just got this app a few days ago I was so excited but every time I try to use it it shuts down. Do not buy!
This app has no instructions and the program distorts doesn't format pixels correctly. Regret
It would be nice to be able to click on individual beads in the pattern and have the app tell what color it is. Sometimes colors are so close and it is difficult to distinguish.

I bought this hoping for a color guide and that's pretty much the only thing I was able to use it for. App likes to crash a lot when attempting to load an image. In my opinion this app is not really worth 4 dollars.
Crashes on a lot of photos I try to convert into projects
Keeps crashing on certain images. And always the same ones too? About 85% work, but the same images keep falling.
App force closes as soon as I open a sprite, tried multiple formats, no difference. Very disappointed, using nexus 7, figured it would work on a flagship device. Refunded.
But it keeps crashing after uploading an image and not sending me emails

I like this app a lot but I can't delete the pictures like I could before so I have pictures piling up on the side, also would be really really useful if I there was an option to change the colors to what I want, singly or all 'like' colors at a time

I have been watching this app for a while now and was excited about it. Finally bought and am kinda dissapointed. Why is there still no color customization when free bead apps and programs can do that and your customers have been requesting that feature for a while now? An actual grid when you set the width and height so it shows the pegboards in the picture as you are setting it would be nice. Also the app feels limited in options and what you can do. Some advanced options would be cool.

I have a couple of small recommendations that might help improve the functionality of this app. It would be great if the Delete button in the main menu remain visible to select while scrolling through your list of sprites. If I have a long list of sprites, i have to scroll all the way to the top of the list to hit the delete button to remove the sprite.  Also it would be great if the app had the ability to seamlessly transition back and forth to the main menu from different folder directories.

I agree with several other user's comments about customizing the colors. Another thing I think would be helpful (but maybe impossible to do, I know nothing about programming applications) is if a color is selected from the information list of your created sprite, this corresponding colors on the grid will be highlighted (maybe bold or flashing or something like that.) Lastly, it does crash pretty frequently on me. I've only encountered it when I am trying to create a new sprite but it will close the app.
Crashes 90% of the time. Great potential... if it works. I have a samsung s3

Love this app on IOS. Here on android is not exception. However it doesn't seem to read the entire picture unless I shrink the photos. By doing that it distorts the actual image and won't come out with the details its supposed to have. Please fix this. Other than that, it work great. Also please add the nabbi beads selection.

I've been using perler beads for years and simply love this app, I've been waiting a LONG time for it to hit the android market. Only problem I have with the app is the color choices it gives you. Even when I take a sprite that has just 4 colors and try to use the app for it, it turns cream/skintone/yellow colors to white, orange to yellow, brown to a worse shade of brown.  Overall, App is still great though, Would like to see the colors refined to better selections as well as maybe a more clear option for scaling sprites/pictures. The max of 147x147 doesn't allow for "HD" looking textures with a lot of color or depth.  Maybe an option for the amount of colors we would like to use , ie: 4, 6, 8, 16, 32, 64 to resemble the "bits" aka detail allowed in a sprite/pattern it converts.

Greatest $4 ever spent.  I bought this because I needed something to build a grid on and this is so great.  I will admit that I'll use it for a lot of cross stitching and crocheting charts too.I just wish there was a way you could tweak the colors and remove/add different colors so we can see what those changes might look like.  You should make am app with embroidery floss/ super saver yarn for cross stitchers and crocheters :-)
I'm not sure what my issue is, my colors are coming out horrible
I love it. Would like to see an option for original colors in addition to hama/perler beads.
